short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks distracting websites during user-defined focus periods

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Socials & Entertainment Blocker

Stay focused on your studies or work by blocking distracting social media and entertainment websites.

Features:

   - Blocks popular social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, X, Instagram, etc.) to reduce interruptions while studying or working.
  -  Prevents access to entertainment sites (e.g., Netflix, YouTube, Amazon Prime, etc) that can divert attention from important tasks.
  -  Encourages better time management and productivity by minimizing online distractions.
  -  It comes with session support, your sessions will be saved even if the browser accidentally closes.

Preferred Audience: whoever struggles with focus while working, studying, or engaging in other productive activities.

Goal: This extension is built to help people manage their online habits, improve concentration, and control their digital environment, empowering them to study or work without distractions.
